casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Emile George FRYOU. No. 419P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Richard Croutharmel, for Fryou, Emile George. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 28th of December 2015 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
